game.name: Christmas Panda Run
game.description:
There is a cute and brave panda who looks pretty excited to return his home and enjoy the celebration of Christmas with his family. Time is very short, but he is determined to reach home and meet his family. So, he has decided to run continuously. However, the problem is that the platform he wants to run is full of obstacles. Luckily, he has spotted you who get ready to him out. Join Christmas Panda Run game and be prepared to help courageous panda on his unique adventure!
Jump over the obstacles and shoot enemies by tapping the buttons in mobile phones or use the arrow key to jump and shoot using the space bar on PC! Do not forget to grab the gold coins to improve your score in the end of this cool html5 running game! Be alert all the time as enemies are spreading everywhere on the platform. You also have the ammo to fight hard against the evil monsters which are both in the air and on the ground. Kill, jump and run and also collect in this endless runner game!
Obstacles may be in the form of deadly monsters, ghosts and flying birds. Make sure not to give up the gold he sees on the screen. It is in your hands how wisely you can assist him to sail through the dangerous obstacles and eliminate as many blood-thirsty monsters and ghosts as you can. The farther you will go by eliminating enemies, the higher score you will be able to hit the scoreboard. Will you be able to survive for long in this runner game or end up smashed by a snowball?
